name: 白姝玉
objective:
1. 工程寫作的基本要素︰寫作結構、段落、與標點符號
2. 升學與求職之寫作︰履歷表、自傳、求職信、面試資料與應對技巧 
3. 論文與技術報告之寫作︰論文寫作項目與格式、摘要之寫法 
4. 口語表達之技能︰簡報、投影片設計、圖表或動畫製作  
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.Technical Writing Basic: structures, paragraph, and punctuation 
2.Application for Advanced Study / Interview: resume, autobiography, cover letter   
3.Thesis / Academic/ Technical Paper: items, format and abstract 
4.Presentation Skills: oral presentation, slide design by PowerPoint, tables, graphics, animation, etc.
